title: The Greatest Estate Designer - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Brotherhood   Calm Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Engineer   European Ambience   Friendship   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Knights   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Money Grubber   Multiple POV   Nobles   Pets   Poor to Rich   Possession   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong

description: The only son of a country side baron, who is called tr*sh and hated by his family, subordinates, and every citizen of the fief. One day, he suddenly loses consciousness, and when he opens his eyes… Inside his body was… a Korean civil engineer.>
